answerText: pipette[10] One might pipette a solution of these circular pieces of DNA into a suspension of bacteria in order to perform a transformation experiment. These extra-chromosomal pieces of DNA are capable of independent replication.

question: Question: One way to measure the cortical strength of cells is to aspirate the cell using a micro one of these devices. For 10 points each: [10] Name these devices used to withdraw and dispense a set amount of liquid. One should replace the disposable tip when changing samples.
